text: {"insights":["Revenue grew 18% YoY driven by improved ARPA from new enterprise deals","Customer churn increased significantly from 3.1% to 4.0%, representing a 29% relative increase","Support tickets rose 25% following a pricing change, indicating customer friction with new pricing structure"],"risk":"The pricing change is causing customer dissatisfaction evidenced by increased support tickets and higher churn, which could offset revenue gains if not addressed","next_action":"Analyze support ticket themes related to pricing concerns and develop a retention strategy targeting at-risk customers impacted by the pricing change"}
